resources.string:
""A little rusty on your color theory? Material design makes color easy." 
Color Reference helps you choose a nice primary color for your new app. 
To learn more, please visit https://www.google.com/design/spec/style/color.html# 
Source code on GitHub: https://github.com/by-syk/ColorReference 
Copyright © 2016 By_syk. All rights reserved."

"Apps that donâ€™t have existing color schemes may select colors from the material design color palette. \nSuggestions: \n500 version for primary color, 700 version for dark primary color and A200 for accent color."
